DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study test effectiveness Internet-delivered Acceptance Commitment Therapy ( ACT ) program reduce anxiety symptom .
DOC.brief_title: Online Acceptance Commitment Therapy Reducing Anxiety
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study test effectiveness level acceptability Internet-delivered Acceptance Commitment Therapy ( ACT ) program reducing symptom anxiety . The effectiveness intervention compare wait-list control group use randomize control trial ( RCT ) design . The participant high / clinical level anxiety active treatment group opportunity read seven ACT module receive personalize feedback complete homework assignment . The intervention deliver online participant seven week complete seven module ( might add one extra week treatment participant event need compensate treatment delay accumulate previous seven week ) .
DOC.criteria: fluent Romanian 18 year age high level anxiety access Internetconnected computer suicidal ideation substance abuse severe psychiatric disorder recent change psychotropic medication ( i.e. , dose change within last month )
DOC.keyword: Anxiety symptoms/disorders ( OCD , PTSD , GAD , SAD , Panic )
